subject: Interest Bearing Working Capital Advance against unbilled executed work to mitigate the cash flow problems of HAM Concessionaire & EPC contractors and modification in Schedule-H of the EPC Contract.
text: IRdy 7ql4 TTTHNfsifetarrut TM9, IPhone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (8t 4Rar- ar_(rTATf AArc4) Y48 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 HI National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) v-5 & 6, #a2r-10 , ERa, #6 ferit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI Policy Guidelines/HAM & EPC Projects/2o19 Policy Circular No. 9.2.30/2019 Dated 9 November , 2019 [Decision taken on File No. NHAI/CMD/Circulation/2018 of Contract Management Division] Sub.: Interest Bearing Working Capital Advance against unbilled executed work to mitigate the cash flow problems of HAM Concessionaire & EPC contractors and modification in Schedule-H of the EPC Contract. Ministry of Road Transport & Highways  vide letter no_ RO/MUM/ NHDP- 39/2015-16 (Computer No. 176793) dated 09.11.2019 (Annexure-1) has issued Guidelines on the subject "Interest Bearing Working Capital Advance against unbilled executed work to mitigate the cash flow problems of HAM Concessionaire & EPC contractors and modification in Schedule-H of the EPC Contract" 2  Earlier, NHAI had issued the following circulars in the matter:- (i) Circular no. 9.2.23/2019 dated 12.04.2019 on the subject 'Modification of Schedule H of EPC Contracts" (ji) Circular no_ 9.2.26/2019 dated 16.08.2019 on the subject Interest Bearing Working Capital Advance against unbilled executed work to mitigate the cash flow problems of contractors of EPC Projects' 3_ In the light of the MoRTH guidelines dated 09.11.2019, and in supersession of NHAI circulars dated 12.04.2019 & 16.08.2019, it has been decided by the Competent Authority NHAI to follow the MoRTH guidelines dated 09.11.2019 for implementation of NHAI projects but with the following modifications: (A) Interest Bearing Working Capital Advance for HAM Projects: Para 1.2 (iii) and  (iv) Concerned Project Director NHAI (PD, NHAI) is authorized for releasing the requisite grant as interest  bearing  working capital advance with the approval of Regional Officer of NHAI (RO, NHAI): (B) Interest Bearing Working Capital Advance for EPC Projects: Para 2.2 (v): Concerned PD NHAI is authorized for releasing the requisite amount with the approval of RO NHAI.
